title: Andrew J. Crawford
text:
Hello my name is Andrew Crawford, I am a junior BSN candidate at the Case Western Reserve University school of nursing. I am also currently pursing a minor in applied data science to strengthen my nursing research and data science skills.
I currently have an interest in critical care nursing and hold a nursing assistant job at University Hospitals CMC ED. Upon graduation I plan on working in an emergency department or an ICU. I am also able to pursue my interest in critical care through working as a volunteer research assistant on Dr. Andrew Reimer’s Medical Transport Statistics laboratory. I use R to analyze the multiple data sets HCUP posts with a specific interest in patient disposition.
Outside of academics I enjoy cooking and currently play water polo on the CWRU club water polo team. I also enjoy traveling and hiking when time allows for it. I have backpacked the Porcupine mountains of Michigan and the Sangre de Cristo mountains of New Mexico.
Please use my email listed below if you wish to contact me.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This my first post, Welcome!
On this blog here I will post the progress with my future studies and publications. I will also post any new jobs I start within my nursing career or future personal events. I look forward to adding to my blog and sharing my career progression!
